list_definition.definition: (with for) to remain or stay (in the same place or without doing anything)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Wait (for) two minutes (here) while I go inside
I was just waiting for that pile of dishes to fall!

list_definition.definition: (with on) to serve dishes, drinks etc (at table)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She employed a servant to wait on her guests

list_definition.definition: an act of waiting; a delay

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There was a long wait before they could get on the train.
